short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is QA plugin for MM AdRoll Customer Support

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the NextRoll Customer support QA plugin for MM <> Customer support
Calculates the timespent on a ticket.

MM <> Customer support WorkLog is an internal extension that lets you.
1. Work on zendesk tickets with simple Start, Pause and Stop button.
2. Calculates the timespent on tickets in zendesk.
3. Removes manual entries in timetracker.

Increase Productivity, save time.
